snippet: Christine C. Quinn, the City Council speaker and a Democratic candidate for mayor, wants meters shut off during the hours when drivers are not required to pay for parking.
abstract: New York City Council Speaker Christine C Quinn plans to introduce bill intended to change functioning of city's Muni-Meter parking machines with aim of reducing unnecessary charges to drivers; bill is seen as populist move in fraught mayoral election season.
lead_paragraph: Christine C. Quinn, the City Council speaker and a Democratic candidate for mayor, wants meters shut off during the hours when drivers are not required to pay for parking.

headline.seo: Quinn Takes Aim at ‘Gotcha’ Parking Tickets
headline.main: Quinn Announces Another Effort to Make Parking Meters More User-Friendly
headline.print_headline: Quinn Announces Another Effort to Make Parking Meters More User-Friendly
